body_html: Yes we'd love to update bleach and html5lib if they're bumped internally, which is easier said than done. Big breaking changes. We ideally need a way to vendor dependencies like these with histories of breakages inside our pip package, cf. import pip._vendor.…

body: Yes we'd love to update bleach and html5lib if they're bumped internally, which is easier said than done. Big breaking changes. We ideally need a way to vendor dependencies like these with histories of breakages inside our pip package, cf. `import pip._vendor.…`
